question:
The apartment that you have rented was repaired recently. Later you discovered some defects in repairs. Write a letter to your landlord; In your letter.


Explain what the problem is
Suggest how it can be fixed
Say what you would like the landlord to do about it.
text: I’m one of your tenants living at Room 123 Building A, City Condo. I hope you are doing well and staying safe. I’m grateful that you are taking care of the maintenance of the room every 6 months and providing good facilities for me.

I’m writing this letter to inform you that the repairman you sent yesterday didn't fix the broken window property carefully, and now I cannot open the sliding window because I think something is stuck in it the sidling window. I should have checked before he left but I was busy with some urgent work.

It'd be good if you can send another repairman to fix it as soon as possible because my room is full of musty and I cannot sleep. I'll be available this week. Please and let me know in advance when a repairman will come. This time, I'll make sure that it works before he leaves.
